mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DB_HOMEPAGE.TB_RISING_RESULT ( RISE_SEQ, RQST_ID, KYWD, WGVL_VL, RISE_RANK, FRQ, BFR_RANK, SCR, LAST_OTPT_YMD ) VALUES( (SELECT SEQ FROM (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(RISE_SEQ),0)+1 AS SEQ FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.TB_RISING_RESULT) A), #{rqstId}, #{kywd}, #{wgvlVl}, #{riseRank}, #{frq}, #{bfrRank}, #{scr}, SYSDATE() )

INSERT INTO DB_HOMEPAGE.TB_TOP_RESULT ( KYWD_RANK_SEQ, RQST_ID, KYWD, WGVL_VL, PRORD, FRQ, BFR_RANK, SCR, LAST_OTPT_YMD ) VALUES ( (SELECT SEQ FROM (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(KYWD_RANK_SEQ),0)+1 AS SEQ FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.TB_TOP_RESULT) A), #{rqstId}, #{kywd}, #{wgvlVl}, #{prord}, #{frq}, #{bfrRank}, #{scr}, SYSDATE() )
